# BBa_R0011
## Experience

``` {r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```

``` {r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
igem_team <- read_excel("promoter_3nd.xlsx", sheet="team", skip=0, col_names=T)
igem_part <- read_excel("promoter_3nd.xlsx", sheet="part", skip=0, col_names=T)
igem_obs <- read_excel("promoter_3nd.xlsx", sheet="obs", skip=0, col_names=T)

igem_promoter <- igem_part %>%
  left_join(igem_team, by="team_name") %>%
  left_join(igem_obs, by="device_id")

igem_part
knitr::kable(igem_promoter)
```

``` {r, echo=FALSE}
plot_data <- igem_promoter %>% 
  filter(Bbid=="BBa_R0011") %>% 
  select(type, strain, conc, value) %>% 
  mutate(strain=factor(strain), conc=factor(conc))


ggplot(plot_data, aes(x=type, y=value, fill=conc)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", position=position_dodge(width=0.5), width=0.4) +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("#ce1212", "#4a47a3")) +
  theme_bw()
```
